MD.unit.make_bcc

Package MD.unit.make_bcc

This module is used to generate a unit cell of cscl bcc crystall. More...

Functions

def make_bcc
 Make a unit crystal from primitive vectors of a cscl crystal.

Detailed Description

This module is used to generate a unit cell of cscl bcc crystall.

This will work for any crystall type given three primitive vectors of the bravais lattice and an origin point. But is designed specifically for a bcc crystall

Function Documentation

def MD.unit.make_bcc.make_bcc (   a1,
  a2,
  a3,
  basis,
  L 
)

Make a unit crystal from primitive vectors of a cscl crystal.

Returns:
the crystall containing points [atom][type,x,y,z] where type is "A" or "B" of the cscl crystall
an .xyz file called qlattice with the points in vmd type format
Parameters:
a1,a2,a3 are the primitive vectors
basis is a point that will act as the origin of the crystal
L the box size the crystall will fit inside
